alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 12:09AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Snow showers will affect Northern Whiteside and Southeastern Carroll counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1208 AM CDT, snow showers were located over Ustick, or 8 miles north of Morrison, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Visibilities less than a quarter of a mile and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACTS...Snow covered surfaces including roadways, bridges, overpasses, and sidewalks. Low visibility. Locations impacted include... Sterling, Rock Falls, Morrison, Fulton, Garden Plain, Milledgeville, Fairhaven, Albany, Chadwick, Coleta, East Clinton, Emerson, Argo Fay, Union Grove, Ustick, Thomson, Round Grove, Hitt, Ideal and Carroll County Fairgrounds. This includes Interstate 88 between mile markers 32 and 44. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
